item.title: How can i stop telle noobs on a pimpscape base?
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Yeh, its for testscape, hence the thing that says

Source
Testscape

Alright. Well, if you want that…
Look for the coding for teleport spells…


     if (s == "Varrock")
     {
        teleportToX = 3210;
        teleportToY = 3424;
        addSkillXP((125*playerLevel[6]), 6);
        heightLevel = 0;
        actionTimer = 10;
     }

Change the 125 to a 1, meaning, it will only give them 1 xp times their level, not 125…
Therefore, no exp, no reason to tele =P[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 07:09:09 PM[/size][hr]Oh, Btw, pimpscape is modified testscape. Noob.

Read full topic

item.source: How can i stop telle noobs on a pimpscape base?

item.title: How can i stop telle noobs on a pimpscape base?
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Like, teleporting out of wild? Alright. Well, Lets base it off the +20 wild coding…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("range"))
	{
	if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) 
	{
	sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
	}
	else if (absY <= 3672)
	{
		teleportToX = 2680;
		teleportToY = 3425;
		sendMessage("Begin Ranging Here");
	}
      	else if (absY >= 10112)
    	{
     	sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
    	}
	}

Now, if you want to make it so you cant teleport out of any level wild, lets change it…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("range"))
	{
	if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) 
	{
	sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
	}
	else if (absY <= 3522)
	{
		teleportToX = 2680;
		teleportToY = 3425;
		sendMessage("Begin Ranging Here");
	}
      	else if (absY >= 10112)
    	{
     	sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
    	}
	}

Now, see the

else if (absY <= 3522)

That is the Y Coord of what you don’t want people teleporting above. In this case, its the beggining of the wild…

Do this for all commands, and for teleporting in general with runes…
Search your client.java for “varrock”
First you should find, or maybe a few after, is teleporting related things. Look down for this…

else if(playerLevel[6] < level) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+level+" to cast this spell."); } else if(inwildy == true) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); }
The

else if(inwildy == true) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); }
That will prevent teleportation

Source
Testscape
Credits
Me

+rep if you like.

Read full topic
